quote: I think people who are creative are the luckiest people on earth. I know that there are no shortcuts, but you must keep your faith in something Greater than You, and keep doing what you love. Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
author: Judy Collins

quote: Listen to the inner light; it will guide you. Listen to inner peace; it will feed you. Listen to inner love; it will transform you, it will divinise you, it will immortalise you.
author: Sri Chinmoy

quote: 'Tis love that makes the world go round, my baby.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Waking up every day and loving someone who may or may not love us back, whose safety we can't ensure, who may stay in our lives or may leave without a moment's notice, who may be loyal to the day they die or betray us tomorrow - that's vulnerability.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Being in love with somebody is a wonderful feeling.
author: Shane Warne

quote: Everybody has fallen down or been disappointed in love. Where you truly shine is when you get back up. Use it as a learning experience and believe in all of the possibilities.
author: Sherry Argov

quote: If you can learn to love yourself and all the flaws, you can love other people so much better. And that makes you so happy.
author: Kristin Chenoweth

quote: At sunrise everything is luminous but not clear. It is those we live with and love and should know who elude us. You can love completely without complete understanding.
author: Norman Maclean

quote: I just love working hard. I love being part of a team I love working toward a common goal.
author: Tom Brady

quote: I love holidays. It's such a wonderful time for the whole family to be together and not have to worry about schedules and that kind of thing.
author: Toni Collette

quote: No woman ever hates a man for being in love with her, but many a woman hate a man for being a friend to her.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Breakfast is a big deal. I love it.
author: Joey Lawrence

quote: We need 4 hugs a day for survival. We need 8 hugs a day for maintenance. We need 12 hugs a day for growth.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: I have a very strong feeling that the opposite of love is not hate - it's apathy. It's not giving a damn.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: The more people love you, the more there's going to be people that hate you.
author: Kylie Jenner

quote: Talent alone gets you nowhere. You really have to have the grit, and you gotta have a love for people.
author: Zac Brown

quote: In the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: Love is the only gold.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I am happier when I love than when I am loved. I adore my husband, my son, my grandchildren, my mother, my dog, and frankly, I don't know if they even like me. But who cares? Loving them is my joy.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: The way to know life is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: You don't walk away if you love someone. You help the person.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Some think love can be measured by the amount of butterflies in their tummy. Others think love can be measured in bunches of flowers, or by using the words 'for ever.' But love can only truly be measured by actions. It can be a small thing, such as peeling an orange for a person you love because you know they don't like doing it.
author: Marian Keyes

quote: I have a personal ambition to live my life honestly and honor the true love that I've had and also the people I've had around me. I want to stay hopeful, even though I get scared about why we're even alive at all.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: I work really hard at trying to see the big picture and not getting stuck in ego. I believe we're all put on this planet for a purpose, and we all have a different purpose... When you connect with that love and that compassion, that's when everything unfolds.
author: Ellen DeGeneres

quote: I guess what really forms you as a person is what you do within your family to receive love or attention. In my family, what you had to do to receive attention was to have good conversation at the dinner table or for me to do well at school, and those were really my focuses because that was what was valued the most.
author: Emma Watson

quote: Accustom yourself continually to make many acts of love, for they enkindle and melt the soul.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Come live with me and be my love, And we will all the pleasures prove, That valleys, groves, hills, and fields, Woods, or steepy mountain yields.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: I love shopping; I'm a jeans and a T-shirt kind of girl, but I go classy when I dress up - with a little bit of sexy.
author: Adrianne Palicki

quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
author: Judy Collins
category: Do What You Love, World, You

quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible - it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: I love fools' experiments. I am always making them.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: One look at an email can rob you of 15 minutes of focus. One call on your cell phone, one tweet, one instant message can destroy your schedule, forcing you to move meetings, or blow off really important things, like love, and friendship.
author: Jacqueline Leo

quote: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Though lovers be lost, love shall not.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: I love mankind it's people I can't stand.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Never pretend to a love which you do not actually feel, for love is not ours to command.
author: Alan Watts

quote: To be fond of dancing was a certain step towards falling in love.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Yeah, I love doing ensemble pieces. You get to meet so many new people and make new friends.
author: Devon Sawa

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The love you have for your child is so much greater than any challenge you'll face as a parent, and that's what helps you through.
author: Hilary Duff

quote: Love thou the rose, yet leave it on its stem.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.
author: Leslie Fiedler

quote: The work of community, love, reconciliation, restoration is the work we cannot leave up to politicians. This is the work we are all called to do.
author: Shane Claiborne

quote: A lot of people say, 'Wow, you're a single father of twin boys, that's crazy!' Two toddlers can get hectic, but I wouldn't change it for anything. Every day they teach me different things. The love is there. When you have a two-year-old saying every other hour, 'Papi, te amo. Papi, I love you,' it can't get better.
author: Ricky Martin

quote: Even if a unity of faith is not possible, a unity of love is.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: Love will draw an elephant through a key-hole.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!
author: Sitting Bull

quote: Nobody loves a woman because she is handsome or ugly, stupid or intelligent. We love because we love.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: True love is eternal, infinite, and always like itself. It is equal and pure, without violent demonstrations: it is seen with white hairs and is always young in the heart.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: If you want to be loved, be lovable.
author: Ovid

quote: Being in love is the only transcendent experience.
author: Armistead Maupin

quote: Without contraries is no progression. Attraction and repulsion, reason and energy, love and hate, are necessary to human existence.
author: William Blake

quote: It's so different when you change your hair color, you're treated so differently. It's a very funny experience. It's fun - I love changing up my hair.
author: Kate Bosworth

quote: I've only been in love with a beer bottle and a mirror.
author: Sid Vicious

quote: The dawn is not distant, nor is the night starless; love is eternal.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: I'm simple. I love hiking, going to the gym, doing some simple stuff. I love being outdoors, I love bike riding. Just stuff that's fun!
author: Lea Michele

quote: Love other human beings as you would love yourself.
author: Ho Chi Minh

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.
author: Princess Diana

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Be of love a little more careful than of anything.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The mornings along the coast where the fog and mist meet with the salty spray of the seas is one of my favourite smells. I love the smell in the evergreen forest just after it rains - The Redwood Forest in California has the coast, too, so you have the best of everything!
author: Paul Walker

quote: Love is the attempt to form a friendship inspired by beauty.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: To love is to admire with the heart to admire is to love with the mind.
author: Theophile Gautier

quote: Pets have more love and compassion in them than most humans.
author: Robert Wagner

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: Love of country, subordination of personal interests to the common good, concern and care for the helpless and the impoverished - these are among the lost and faded values that we seek to recover and revitalize as we commence our journey towards a better Philippines.
author: Rodrigo Duterte

quote: We shouldn't teach great books we should teach a love of reading.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: Life is like an onion. You peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Love is metaphysical gravity.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: I have great hopes that we shall love each other all our lives as much as if we had never married at all.
author: Lord Byron

quote: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I'm nutty bunny number two. I love me and I love you.
author: Mark McKinney

quote: The cynic finds love with the idealist. The rebel with the conformist. The social butterfly with the bookworm. They help each other balance their lives.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Love is blind.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
author: Barbara De Angelis

quote: Love without conversation is impossible.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: I'm very, very lazy. I love to sit in a chair and look out the window and do nothing.
author: Ingmar Bergman

quote: Tell me who admires and loves you, and I will tell you who you are.
author: Antoine de Saint-Exupery

quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Life is too short to do the things you don't love doing.
author: Bruce Dickinson

quote: Love is the best thing in the world, and the thing that lives the longest.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.
author: John Keats

quote: Love is like an hourglass, with the heart filling up as the brain empties.
author: Jules Renard

quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
author: Lord Byron

quote: Love is the ultimate expression of the will to live.
author: Tom Wolfe

quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
author: Voltaire

quote: Choose your love, Love your choice.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Jealousy contains more of self-love than of love.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
author: Euripides

quote: Love and doubt have never been on speaking terms.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I'm a really nostalgic person. I love taking photos and video and having memories. I remember all my childhood videos that my dad used to take. I think that's really what life is about - especially when you start a family of your own.
author: Kim Kardashian

quote: Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: There is a Fountain of Youth: It is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of the people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
author: Sophia Loren

quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable or it is no virtue at all.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Bitterness imprisons life love releases it.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: Love does not dominate it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
author: John Donne

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Love is space and time measured by the heart.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: We love because it's the only true adventure.
author: Nikki Giovanni

quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
author: Plato

quote: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: There is a woman at the begining of all great things.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Love is the crowning grace of humanity, the holiest right of the soul, the golden link which binds us to duty and truth, the redeeming principle that chiefly reconciles the heart to life, and is prophetic of eternal good.
author: Petrarch

quote: Love is suffering. One side always loves more.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Suffering passes, while love is eternal. That's a gift that you have received from God. Don't waste it.
author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quote: Love feels no burden, thinks nothing of trouble, attempts what is above its strength, pleads no excuse of impossibility; for it thinks all things lawful for itself, and all things possible.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: He who loves with purity considers not the gift of the lover, but the love of the giver.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: We owe to the Middle Ages the two worst inventions of humanity - romantic love and gunpowder.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: The biggest surprise, which is also the best, is that I didn't know I would love motherhood as much as I do.
author: Deborah Norville

quote: Some people can't stand being alone. I love solitude and silence. But when I come out of it, I'm a regular talking machine. It's all or nothing for me.
author: Celine Dion

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, With love in the loving cup, Whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: I love being on the beach - it's my favourite place. I can chill out, read, listen to music, play with my daughter.
author: Geri Halliwell

quote: I think careful cooking is love, don't you? The loveliest thing you can cook for someone who's close to you is about as nice a valentine as you can give.
author: Julia Child

quote: The love of one's country is a splendid thing. But why should love stop at the border?
author: Pablo Casals

quote: To love rightly is to love what is orderly and beautiful in an educated and disciplined way.
author: Plato

quote: When people are lame, they love to blame.
author: Robert Kiyosaki

quote: There is only one secure foundation: a genuine, deep relationship with Jesus Christ, which will carry you through any and all turmoil. No matter what storms are raging all around, you'll stand firm if you stand on His love.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I think one of the best words in the English language is 'compassion.' I think it holds everything. It holds love, it holds care... and if everybody just did something. We all make a difference.
author: Michael Crawford

quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
author: Javan

quote: When we recognise the virtues, the talent, the beauty of Mother Earth, something is born in us, some kind of connection; love is born.
author: Nhat Hanh

quote: To live in this world, you must be able to do three things: to love what is mortal; to hold it against your bones knowing your own life depends on it; and, when the time comes to let it go, to let it go.
author: Mary Oliver

quote: I love coffee. It's one of my favorite things in the world, and I love tasting different coffees.
author: Max Schneider

quote: With our love, we could save the world.
author: George Harrison

quote: Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow. Don't walk behind me, I may not lead. There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
author: Maurice Chevalier

quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
author: Ray Stannard Baker

quote: I'm a girl who loves fashion. I'm such a Cinderella - I love to put on a great dress and heels. It's fun!
author: Maria Bello

quote: Death and love are the two wings that bear the good man to heaven.
author: Michelangelo

quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: All my life, my heart has yearned for a thing I cannot name.
author: Andre Breton

quote: The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Friendship often ends in love but love in friendship - never.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Love is supreme and unconditional like is nice but limited.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Down on your knees, and thank heaven, fasting, for a good man's love.
author: Euripides

quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
author: Euripides

quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: A gentle heart is tied with an easy thread.
author: George Herbert

quote: What force is more potent than love?
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: The moment you have in your heart this extraordinary thing called love and feel the depth, the delight, the ecstasy of it, you will discover that for you the world is transformed.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: People protect what they love.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
author: James Thurber

quote: To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the gods.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: But love's a malady without a cure.
author: John Dryden

quote: Passion is momentary love is enduring.
author: John Wooden

quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Love is much nicer to be in than an automobile accident, a tight girdle, a higher tax bracket or a holding pattern over Philadelphia.
author: Judith Viorst

quote: Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: We all need each other.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: The world is not comprehensible, but it is embraceable: through the embracing of one of its beings.
author: Martin Buber

quote: There is only one real deprivation... and that is not to be able to give one's gifts to those one loves most.
author: May Sarton

quote: It is impossible to repent of love. The sin of love does not exist.
author: Muriel Spark

quote: Selfishness is one of the qualities apt to inspire love.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.
author: Robert Burton

quote: This love is silent.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Love seeks one thing only: the good of the one loved. It leaves all the other secondary effects to take care of themselves. Love, therefore, is its own reward.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: To love another person is to see the face of God.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love conquers all.
author: Virgil

quote: I think it is all a matter of love: the more you love a memory, the stronger and stranger it is.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: The ear is the avenue to the heart.
author: Voltaire

quote: Love seeketh not itself to please, nor for itself hath any care, but for another gives its ease, and builds a Heaven in Hell's despair.
author: William Blake

quote: The love of liberty is the love of others the love of power is the love of ourselves.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
author: John Gay

quote: Romantic love is an illusion. Most of us discover this truth at the end of a love affair or else when the sweet emotions of love lead us into marriage and then turn down their flames.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: To be able to say how much love, is love but little.
author: Petrarch

quote: One does not fall in love; one grows into love, and love grows in him.
author: Karl A. Menninger

quote: Love is a great beautifier.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: The fate of love is that it always seems too little or too much.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: Love is the great miracle cure. Loving ourselves works miracles in our lives.
author: Louise L. Hay

quote: For above all things Love means sweetness, and truth, and measure; yea, loyalty to the loved one and to your word. And because of this I dare not meddle with so high a matter.
author: Marie de France

quote: There is no person that love cannot heal there is no soul that love cannot save.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: When love is at its best, one loves so much that he cannot forget.
author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quote: It's important for us to latch onto the people that we love.
author: Connie Stevens

quote: Love can be unselfish, in the sense of being benevolent and generous, without being selfless.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Love knows not distance it hath no continent its eyes are for the stars.
author: Gilbert Parker

quote: The essential conditions of everything you do must be choice, love, passion.
author: Nadia Boulanger

quote: I love California, I practically grew up in Phoenix.
author: Dan Quayle

quote: I used to think that love was giving up everything of yourself and giving it to the other person. Now, I've realized that love is when you have somebody that doesn't make you give up half of yourself.
author: Kehlani

quote: Your feelings so are important to write down, to capture, and to remember because today you're heartbroken, but tomorrow you'll be in love again.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Have we not come to such an impasse in the modern world that we must love our enemies - or else? The chain reaction of evil - hate begetting hate, wars producing more wars - must be broken, or else we shall be plunged into the dark abyss of annihilation.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Happy is the man whom the Muses love: sweet speech flows from his mouth.
author: Hesiod

quote: We have observed that, in society and the world in which we live, selfishness has increased more than love for others, and that men of good will must work, each with his own strengths and expertise, to ensure that love for others increases until it is equal and possibly exceeds love for oneself.
author: Pope Francis

quote: To put yourself in another's place requires real imagination, but by doing so each Girl Scout will be able to love among others happily.
author: Juliette Gordon Low

quote: Cherish sunsets, wild creatures and wild places. Have a love affair with the wonder and beauty of the earth.
author: Stewart Udall

quote: I love this life. I feel like I am always catching my breath and saying, 'Oh! Will you look at that?' Photography has been my way of bearing witness to the joy I find in seeing the extraordinary in ordinary life. You don't look for pictures. Your pictures are looking for you.
author: Harold Feinstein

quote: There is nothing wrong with America that faith, love of freedom, intelligence, and energy of her citizens cannot cure.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: You protect your being when you love yourself better. That's the secret.
author: Isabelle Adjani

quote: When people get married because they think it's a long-time love affair, they'll be divorced very soon, because all love affairs end in disappointment. But marriage is a recognition of a spiritual identity.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Love, whether newly born, or aroused from a deathlike slumber, must always create sunshine, filling the heart so full of radiance, this it overflows upon the outward world.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: I represent the kids who come from nothing but who understand it all and love it all. That's what I represent - those are the cool kids, you know, the kids of tomorrow, because who would've known that I'd be who I am today? We are the kids of tomorrow.
author: ASAP Rocky

quote: Love is stronger than justice.
author: Sting

quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.
author: John Morton

quote: Love dies only when growth stops.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: It is an extra dividend when you like the girl you've fallen in love with.
author: Clark Gable

quote: I have been married twice, and those were not the happiest times of my life. Part of the problem, quite frankly, is that when you get married, the romance disappears and the children arrive and the love is transferred. It shouldn't be that way, but too often it is transferred to the children.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Teach love, generosity, good manners and some of that will drift from the classroom to the home and who knows, the children will be educating the parents.
author: Roger Moore

quote: I love history, doesn't matter what era, I'm fascinated.
author: Tom Petty

quote: I suffer the mortification of seeing myself attacked right and left by people at home professing patriotism and love of country who never heard the whistle of a hostile bullet. I pity them and the nation dependent on such for its existence. I am thankful, however that, though such people make a great noise, the masses are not like them.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: My love of fine art increased - the more of it I saw, the more of it I wanted to see.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: Success is when you see something, and you say, 'I want to do that,' and then you do it. It's being happy with what you do and doing what you love every day.
author: Alessia Cara

quote: I'm a photographer, period. I love photography, the immediacy of it. I like the craft, the idea of saying 'I'm a photographer.'
author: David LaChapelle

quote: We love but once, for once only are we perfectly equipped for loving.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: One's art goes as far and as deep as one's love goes.
author: Andrew Wyeth

quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain in life. That word is love.
author: Sophocles

quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
author: Plato

quote: There are never enough I Love You's.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: We may give without loving, but we cannot love without giving.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.
author: Truman Capote

quote: Love prefers twilight to daylight.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Love is energy of life.
author: Robert Browning

quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
author: Boethius

quote: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: There is always something left to love. And if you ain't learned that, you ain't learned nothing.
author: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: The god of love lives in a state of need. It is a need. It is an urge. It is a homeostatic imbalance. Like hunger and thirst, it's almost impossible to stamp out.
author: Plato

quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
author: David Wilkerson

quote: The sweetest noise on earth, a woman's tongue; A string which hath no discord.
author: Bryan Procter

quote: Love is the difficult realization that something other than oneself is real.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Familiar acts are beautiful through love.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: The highest function of love is that it makes the loved one a unique and irreplacable being.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: Love is the greatest gift that God has given us. It's free.
author: Taraji P. Henson

quote: Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Love is being stupid together.
author: Paul Valery

quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Love comes unseen we only see it go.
author: Henry Austin Dobson

quote: The fact is that love is of two kinds, one which commands, and one which obeys. The two are quite distinct, and the passion to which the one gives rise is not the passion of the other.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Is it not by love alone that we succeed in penetrating to the very essence of being?
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: The praise that comes from love does not make us vain, but more humble.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Loved. You can't use it in the past tense. Death does not stop that love at all.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: In the flush of love's light, we dare be brave. And suddenly we see that love costs all we are, and will ever be. Yet it is only love which sets us free.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.
author: Ovid

quote: Sympathy constitutes friendship; but in love there is a sort of antipathy, or opposing passion. Each strives to be the other, and both together make up one whole.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: When you love a man, he becomes more than a body. His physical limbs expand, and his outline recedes, vanishes. He is rich and sweet and right. He is part of the world, the atmosphere, the blue sky and the blue water.
author: Gwendolyn Brooks

quote: In a full heart there is room for everything, and in an empty heart there is room for nothing.
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: Love is a hole in the heart.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: Love is always being given where it is not required.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: The truth is that love smashes into your life like an ice floe, and even if your heart is built like the Titanic you go down.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: Love is love's reward.
author: John Dryden

quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.
author: John Dryden

quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: The cure for all the ills and wrongs, the cares, the sorrows, and the crimes of humanity, all lie in the one word 'love'. It is the divine vitality that everywhere produces and restores life.
author: Lydia M. Child

quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.
author: Ovid

quote: Love is a sacred reserve of energy it is like the blood of spiritual evolution.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: You don't have to go looking for love when it's where you come from.
author: Werner Erhard

quote: There's no bad consequence to loving fully, with all your heart. You always gain by giving love.
author: Reese Witherspoon

quote: Stolen kisses are always sweetest.
author: Leigh Hunt

quote: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
author: Francis Beaumont

quote: Great thoughts come from the heart.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: You don't want to love - your eternal and abnormal craving is to be loved. You aren't positive, you're negative. You absorb, absorb, as if you must fill yourself up with love, because you've got a shortage somewhere.
author: D. H. Lawrence

quote: The spring of love becomes hidden and soon filled up.
author: Max Muller

quote: The inner reality of love can be recognized only by love.
author: Hans Urs von Balthasar

quote: Loving others always costs us something and requires effort. And you have to decide to do it on purpose. You can't wait for a feeling to motivate you.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Who loves, raves.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
author: George Eliot

quote: There isn't any formula or method. You learn to love by loving - by paying attention and doing what one thereby discovers has to be done.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: At the beginning and at the end of love, the two lovers are embarrassed to find themselves alone.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Before I met my husband, I'd never fallen in love. I'd stepped in it a few times.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
author: Shirley MacLaine

quote: The journey from teaching about love to allowing myself to be loved proved much longer than I realised.
author: Henri Nouwen

quote: Love is never wrong.
author: Melissa Etheridge

quote: If it is your time, love will track you down like a cruise missile.
author: Lynda Barry

quote: The love we have in our youth is superficial compared to the love that an old man has for his old wife.
author: Will Durant

quote: No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: We can't command our love, but we can our actions.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: The love which moves the world, according to common Christian belief, is God's love and the love of God.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: To good and true love fear is forever affixed.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: People think love is an emotion. Love is good sense.
author: Ken Kesey

quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: My wife, my family, my friends - they've all taught me things about love and what that emotion really means. In a nutshell, loving someone is about giving, not receiving.
author: Nicholas Sparks

quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
author: Brendan Behan

quote: Love is, above all, the gift of oneself.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: We cease loving ourselves if no one loves us.
author: Madame de Stael

quote: In matters of the heart, nothing is true except the improbable.
author: Madame de Stael

quote: The love of our private friends is the only preparatory exercise for the love of all men.
author: John Henry Newman

quote: A man reserves his true and deepest love not for the species of woman in whose company he finds himself electrified and enkindled, but for that one in whose company he may feel tenderly drowsy.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Say what you will, 'tis better to be left than never to have been loved.
author: William Congreve

quote: The truth is that there is only one terminal dignity - love. And the story of a love is not important - what is important is that one is capable of love. It is perhaps the only glimpse we are permitted of eternity.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: Love is the word used to label the sexual excitement of the young, the habituation of the middle-aged, and the mutual dependence of the old.
author: John Ciardi

quote: What the world really needs is more love and less paper work.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: The deep joy we take in the company of people with whom we have just recently fallen in love is undisguisable.
author: John Cheever

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: Ultimately love is everything.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: You will find as you look back upon your life that the moments when you have truly lived are the moments when you have done things in the spirit of love.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
author: Samuel Lover

quote: Each moment of a happy lover's hour is worth an age of dull and common life.
author: Aphra Behn

quote: One must not trifle with love.
author: Alfred de Musset

quote: I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.
author: Theodore Dreiser

quote: Words may be false and full of art Sighs are the natural language of the heart.
author: Thomas Shadwell

quote: All love is lost but upon God alone.
author: William Dunbar

quote: How absurd and delicious it is to be in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it.
author: Barbara Pym

quote: Sometimes it's hard to be a woman giving all your love to just one man.
author: Tammy Wynette

quote: Stand by your man. Give him two arms to cling to and something warm to come to.
author: Tammy Wynette

quote: Love is... never asking for more than you are prepared to give.
author: Kim Casali

quote: If you've got love you've got life, if you can love you can live.
author: Kim Casali

quote: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
author: Gena Lee Nolin

quote: At the end of the day, the most overwhelming key to a child's success is the positive involvement of parents.
author: Jane D. Hull

quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The gain is not the having of children it is the discovery of love and how to be loving.
author: Polly Berrien Berends

quote: Don't worry that children never listen to you worry that they are always watching you.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: Having a baby is a life-changer. It gives you a whole other perspective on why you wake up every day.
author: Taylor Hanson

quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: A baby is born with a need to be loved - and never outgrows it.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: Let parents bequeath to their children not riches, but the spirit of reverence.
author: Plato

quote: Always kiss your children goodnight, even if they're already asleep.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: To be a good father and mother requires that the parents defer many of their own needs and desires in favor of the needs of their children. As a consequence of this sacrifice, conscientious parents develop a nobility of character and learn to put into practice the selfless truths taught by the Savior Himself.
author: James E. Faust

quote: Children are educated by what the grown-up is and not by his talk.
author: Carl Jung

quote: When you hold your baby in your arms the first time, and you think of all the things you can say and do to influence him, it's a tremendous responsibility. What you do with him can influence not only him, but everyone he meets and not for a day or a month or a year but for time and eternity.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: Every word, facial expression, gesture, or action on the part of a parent gives the child some message about self-worth. It is sad that so many parents don't realize what messages they are sending.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: I'm not a parenting expert. In fact, I'm not sure that I even believe in the idea of 'parenting experts.' I'm an engaged, imperfect parent and a passionate researcher. I'm an experienced mapmaker and a stumbling traveler. Like many of you, parenting is by far my boldest and most daring adventure.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Children are not casual guests in our home. They have been loaned to us temporarily for the purpose of loving them and instilling a foundation of values on which their future lives will be built.
author: James Dobson

quote: The number of stressors has multiplied exponentially: traffic, money, success, work/life balance, the economy, the environment, parenting, family conflict, relationships, disease. As the nature of human life has become far more complicated, our ancient stress response hasn't been able to keep up.
author: Andrew J. Bernstein

quote: Parents were invented to make children happy by giving them something to ignore.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Even as kids reach adolescence, they need more than ever for us to watch over them. Adolescence is not about letting go. It's about hanging on during a very bumpy ride.
author: Ron Taffel

quote: If you bungle raising your children, I don't think whatever else you do matters very much.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: The child supplies the power but the parents have to do the steering.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Abortion is defended today as a means of ensuring the equality and independence of women, and as a solution to the problems of single parenting, child abuse, and the feminization of poverty.
author: Robert Casey

quote: There are times as a parent when you realize that your job is not to be the parent you always imagined you'd be, the parent you always wished you had. Your job is to be the parent your child needs, given the particulars of his or her own life and nature.
author: Ayelet Waldman

quote: The more people have studied different methods of bringing up children the more they have come to the conclusion that what good mothers and fathers instinctively feel like doing for their babies is the best after all.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Every cliche about kids is true; they grow up so quickly, you blink and they're gone, and you have to spend the time with them now. But that's a joy.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: To me luxury is to be at home with my daughter, and the occasional massage doesn't hurt.
author: Olivia Newton-John

quote: Autism is a neurological disorder. It's not caused by bad parenting. It's caused by, you know, abnormal development in the brain. The emotional circuits in the brain are abnormal. And there also are differences in the white matter, which is the brain's computer cables that hook up the different brain departments.
author: Temple Grandin

quote: Childhood is a short season.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Listen to the desires of your children. Encourage them and then give them the autonomy to make their own decision.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Girls are the future mothers of our society, and it is important that we focus on their well-being.
author: Miriam Makeba

quote: My mom and dad gave their kids the greatest gift of all - the gift of unconditional love. They cared deeply about who we would be, and much less about what we would do.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Relationships are complicated no matter what style of parenting you choose.
author: Mayim Bialik

quote: Childhood obesity is best tackled at home through improved parental involvement, increased physical exercise, better diet and restraint from eating.
author: Bob Filner

quote: I think parenting these days is definitely different from when a lot of people grew up. As much blame as we give a lot of our kids for what they're not doing... I also try to give them as much credit for dealing with things that we didn't have to deal with. Bullying was one on one and face to face. Now it's all over the Internet.
author: Nelly

quote: Loving a child doesn't mean giving in to all his whims; to love him is to bring out the best in him, to teach him to love what is difficult.
author: Nadia Boulanger

quote: It's a great mistake, I think, to put children off with falsehoods and nonsense, when their growing powers of observation and discrimination excite in them a desire to know about things.
author: Anne Sullivan

quote: You know, parenting is so personal. And we're all afraid that we didn't quite get it right. And it feels like the stakes are so high. By we - what if we made a mistake?
author: Amy Chua

quote: Any kid will run any errand for you, if you ask at bedtime.
author: Red Skelton

quote: Love is staying up all night with a sick child - or a healthy adult.
author: David Frost

quote: Hugs can do great amounts of good - especially for children.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Parents should not smoke in order to discourage their kids from smoking. A child is more likely to smoke when they have been raised in the environment of a smoker.
author: Christy Turlington

quote: I want to speak directly to the audience, to say, 'I'm like you - I'm frustrated, I'm not an expert, I don't have a manual on parenting, I make mistakes, I'm selfish too.'
author: Bernie Mac

quote: Children should have enough freedom to be themselves - once they've learned the rules.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: We've had bad luck with our kids - they've all grown up.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Nothing you do for children is ever wasted. They seem not to notice us, hovering, averting our eyes, and they seldom offer thanks, but what we do for them is never wasted.
author: Garrison Keillor

quote: The relation between parents and children is essentially based on teaching.
author: Gilbert Highet

quote: Mothers all want their sons to grow up to be president, but they don't want them to become politicians in the process.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Having children is like having a bowling alley installed in your brain.
author: Martin Mull

quote: Mothers - especially single mothers - are heroic in their efforts to raise our nation's children, but men must also take responsibility for their children and recognize the impact they have on their families' well-being.
author: Evan Bayh

quote: Family involvement is a valuable thing and playing together actively can be the '90s version of it. Instead of just watching, you can do it together... something we don't spend enough time on. We can motivate and excite each other about fitness.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: Parenthood always comes as a shock. Postpartum blues? Postpartum panic is more like it. We set out to have a baby what we get is a total take-over of our lives.
author: Polly Berrien Berends

quote: The unconditional love for you child, it's truly amazing.
author: Jourdan Dunn

quote: Everywhere, people are discovering that doing things more slowly often means doing them better and enjoying them more. It means living life instead of rushing through it. You can apply this to everything from food to parenting to work.
author: Carl Honore

quote: Parenting is one of the hardest jobs on earth.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Parenting is not for sissies. You have to sacrifice and grow up.
author: Jillian Michaels

quote: Parenting is the hardest thing I have ever done. I tried to find the balance between the strict, traditional Chinese way I was raised, which I think can be too harsh, and what I see as a tendency in the West to be too permissive and indulgent. If I could do it all again, I would, with some adjustments.
author: Amy Chua

quote: My husband's a pediatrician, so he and I talk about parenting all the time. You can't raise children who have more shame resilience than you do.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Giving kids whatever they ask for is disastrous parenting. There's no sense of something earned. I'm sorry, but when you're 12, you don't need a new cell phone every few months just because a new one comes out.
author: Ewan McGregor

quote: The secret to success, to parenting, to life, is to not count up the cost. Don't focus on all the steps it will take. Don't stare into the abyss at the giant leap it will take. That view will keep you from taking the next small step.
author: Regina Brett

quote: The parenting style that is good for grit is also the parenting style good for most other things: Be really, really demanding, and be very, very supportive.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: Modern parents want to nurture so skillfully that Mother Nature will gasp in admiration at the marvels their parenting produces from the soft clay of children.
author: George Will

quote: You learn that there's no right way to do it, no wrong way to do it. It's just what you feel comfortable with, to trust that, and don't let anybody box you in to a certain style of parenting or make you feel a certain way about what your kids do.
author: Stephen Curry

quote: That's my parenting style - 'Go watch the TV.' I'm one of 11 children, and my mother's parenting style was, 'There's the TV. Go watch it. Mommy's got 10 other people to take care of.'
author: Stephen Colbert

quote: Nobody ever becomes an expert parent. But I think good parenting is about consistency. It's about being there at big moments, but it's also just the consistency of decision making. And it's routine.
author: Sebastian Coe

quote: Tell me how a person judges his or her self-esteem, and I will tell you how that person operates at work, in love, in sex, in parenting, in every important aspect of existence - and how high he or she is likely to rise. The reputation you have with yourself - your self-esteem - is the single most important factor for a fulfilling life.
author: Nathaniel Branden

quote: Few things are more satisfying than seeing your children have teenagers of their own.
author: Doug Larson

quote: Education, like neurosis, begins at home.
author: Milton Sapirstein

quote: If you're financially responsible, your children have a much better chance to grow up financially responsible.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Many people think that discipline is the essence of parenting. But that isn't parenting. Parenting is not telling your child what to do when he or she misbehaves. Parenting is providing the conditions in which a child can realize his or her full human potential.
author: Gordon Neufeld

quote: Kids are fat because of lack of parenting.
author: Ben Shapiro

quote: Parenting involves two separate activities. You have to change your child in that you need to educate your child and instill moral values in them. But you also need to celebrate your child for who he or she is and make them feel really good.
author: Andrew Solomon

quote: At every step the child should be allowed to meet the real experience of life the thorns should never be plucked from his roses.
author: Ellen Key

quote: My worldview, my philosophy, my attitudes, my relationships, my parenting, my marriage - everything has been transformed by my relationship with Christ.
author: Lee Strobel

quote: I had no idea that mothering my own child would be so healing to my own sadness from my childhood.
author: Susie Bright

quote: If we had paid no more attention to our plants than we have to our children, we would now be living in a jungle of weed.
author: Luther Burbank

quote: If you're asking your kids to exercise, then you better do it, too. Practice what you preach.
author: Caitlyn Jenner

quote: The uncertainty of parenting can bring up feelings in us that range from frustration to terror.
author: Brene Brown

quote: If I feel good about my parenting, I have no interest in judging other people's choices. If I feel good about my body, I don't go around making fun of other people's weight or appearance. We're hard on each other because we're using each other as a launching pad out of our own perceived deficiency.
author: Brene Brown

quote: I came to parenting the way most of us do - knowing nothing and trying to learn everything.
author: Mayim Bialik

quote: Leave part of the yard rough. Don't manicure everything. Small children in particular love to turn over rocks and find bugs, and give them some space to do that. Take your child fishing. Take your child on hikes.
author: Richard Louv

quote: Parenthood remains the greatest single preserve of the amateur.
author: Alvin Toffler

quote: The family teaches us about the importance of knowledge, education, hard work and effort. It teaches us about enjoying ourselves, having fun, keeping fit and healthy.
author: Kamisese Mara

quote: The well-being and welfare of children should always be our focus.
author: Todd Tiahrt

quote: We must return optimism to our parenting. To focus on the joys, not the hassles; the love, not the disappointments; the common sense, not the complexities.
author: Fred G. Gosman

quote: Of course, the ideal scenario for parenting is obviously two parents of a mature age.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Parenting now is a two-way relationship where you learn from each other.
author: Juhi Chawla

quote: What lingers from the parent's individual past, unresolved or incomplete, often becomes part of her or his irrational parenting.
author: Virginia Satir

quote: I have a neuroscience background - that's what my doctorate is in - and I was trained to study hormones of attachment, so I definitely feel my parenting is informed by that.
author: Mayim Bialik

quote: If two very different people pool their DNA, they'll create more genetic variety, and their young will come to the job of parenting with a wider array of skills.
author: Helen Fisher

quote: In truth, I am a single mother. But I don't feel alone at all in parenting my daughter. Krishna has a whole other side of her family who loves her, too. And so Krishna is parented by me, but also by her grandmother and aunts and cousins and uncles and friends.
author: Padma Lakshmi

quote: Thing is, I went to a born-again Christian high school, was brought up in a traditional Mormon family where these ideas about parenting are of structure and sacrifice. To think outside of that idea of family and parenting that I've grown up with is tough but also very freeing.
author: Paul Walker

quote: A mother who is really a mother is never free.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Children are our second chance to have a great parent-child relationship.
author: Laura Schlessinger

quote: I regret not having had more time with my kids when they were growing up.
author: Tina Turner

quote: Do you want to be an artist and a writer, or a wife and a lover? With kids, your focus changes. I don't want to go to PTA meetings.
author: Stevie Nicks

quote: That's my ideal day, time with my boys.
author: Kenny G

quote: Success for me its to raise happy, healthy human beings.
author: Kelly LeBrock

quote: The Golden Rule of Parenting is do unto your children as you wish your parents had done unto you!
author: Louise Hart

quote: Don't reward bad behavior. It is one of the first rules of parenting. During the financial cataclysm of 2008, we said it differently. When we bailed out banks that had created their own misfortune, we called it a 'moral hazard,' because the bailout absolved the bank's bad acts and created an incentive for it to make the same bad loans again.
author: Eliot Spitzer

quote: As a dad, you are the Vice President of the executive branch of parenting. It doesn't matter what your personality is like, you will always be Al Gore to your wife's Bill Clinton. She feels the pain and you are the annoying nerd telling them to turn off the lights.
author: Jim Gaffigan

quote: We put more emphasis on who can drive a car than on who can be a parent. And I think there ought to be mandatory parenting classes starting in high school, and you should have to have a license to be able to be a parent to explain that you don't give alcohol to kids.
author: Dale Archer

quote: Learning from wolves to interact with pet dogs makes about as much sense as, 'I want to improve my parenting - let's see how the chimps do it!'
author: Ian Dunbar

quote: I've decided the secret of parenting is benevolent neglect.
author: Barry Humphries

quote: Sleeping is one of the more private aspects of parenting; it happens in a quiet room, whereas eating is a more public aspect of parenting. Other people can see it and compare it to what their kids eat.
author: Adam Mansbach

quote: Happiness is not always through success. Equally, the constant pursuit of success is sure unhappiness. But we have to find the balance. My own thoughts are that parenting is very personal. And we all feel enormous insecurity about parenting. What are they going to think of us 20 years down the line?
author: Amy Chua

quote: To me, Slow parenting is about bringing balance into the home. Children need to strive and struggle and stretch themselves, but that does not mean childhood should be a race. Slow parents give their children plenty of time and space to explore the world on their own terms.
author: Carl Honore

quote: My parents were definitely on the incentive side of parenting. Like, they told me that my father had learned to read when he was three. So, of course, I thought I had to, too.
author: Chelsea Clinton

quote: Don't judge other people. For example, if you want God's anointing to be on you for parenting, you need to be careful not to criticize other parents.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: I think Lincoln had a unique parenting style. He let his kids run free and wild.
author: Steven Spielberg

quote: Most moms and dads, they want to be good moms and dads. But it's an incredibly hard job when you are stressed out, when you are poor, when your life is in chaos. And giving them some of the tools to be better parents, to whittle away at that parenting gap, gives those kids a much better starting point in life.
author: Nicholas Kristof

quote: I sort of feel like people are not that honest about their own parenting. Take any teenage household tell me there is not yelling and conflict.
author: Amy Chua

quote: Tiger parenting is all about raising independent, creative, courageous kids. In America today, there's a dangerous tendency to romanticize creativity in a way that may undermine it.
author: Amy Chua

quote: I believe that at least 70 percent of parenting goes to the mother. In our house, I'm the one who knows about all the school stuff, helps with the homework, organizes the play dates, and remembers the birthday parties.
author: Cindy Crawford

quote: The basic idea that incentives can be used to motivate behavior is a powerful one. It works for employees, and it has a clear place in parenting, as anyone who has tried to potty-train a recalcitrant toddler with sticker rewards knows.
author: Emily Oster

quote: Parenting is the most important job on the planet next to keeping Gary Busey off the nation's highways.
author: Dennis Miller

quote: Parenting is not giving your child everything they want. Parenting is not being your child's friend. Parenting is about preparing your child to be a useful and respectful person in society.
author: GloZell

quote: Children live in the only successful Marxist state ever created: the family. 'From each according to his ability, to each according to his need' is the family's practice as well as its theory. Even with today's scattershot patterns of marriage and parenting, a family is collectivist to a more than North Korean degree.
author: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Most American children suffer too much mother and too little father.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: My childhood should have taught me lessons for my own fatherhood, but it didn't because parenting can only be learned by people who have no children.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: My son was five months old, and I built a makeshift studio in my living room so that I could do the attachment parenting approach and write the record at the same time. That was fortuitous, that we could build that in the house.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: I think parenting is very different now. We're totally governed by our children!
author: Andy Serkis

quote: Parenting is not for everybody. It changes your life. Especially when they're little.
author: Tori Amos

quote: Gerard and I pretty much share all parenting responsibilities, although I'm definitely the disciplinarian.
author: Shakira

quote: From politics to parenting, Christians have something to say.
author: Monica Johnson

quote: Ironically, parenting is a shame and judgment minefield precisely because most of us are wading through uncertainty and self-doubt when it comes to raising our children.
author: Brene Brown

quote: Growth doesn't hurt. This is what I've learned. In the end, it doesn't hurt. It hurts while it's happening. But in the end, you know, for life, for parenting, and for the arts, it's not a bad - not a bad thing to try for.
author: Laura Dern

quote: The children who are 'our future' will inherit a world created not just by parental devotion but by the sort of zealous, focused endeavors that can preclude good parenting.
author: Virginia Postrel

quote: I barely have time for my own children. To adopt more children and not have time for them, that would be poor parenting on my part.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: Parenting isn't just parenting your own child.
author: Lewis Black

quote: Whatever needed to be done, I need to know how to do it just as well as my wife. You know, for us to be able to really balance the parenting. It was very humbling, and it was also, um - terrifying. Because, you know, giving a baby a bath for the first time is one of the scariest things you can do on this whole earth.
author: Jason Isbell

quote: I've been lucky enough to live through all the things that are supposed to give meaning to our lives, like parenting, grandparenting, art, celebrity. All these things you expect meaning to come from, and sometimes it comes when you're not expecting it.
author: Alan Alda

quote: Becoming a father, I think it inevitably changes your perspective of life. I don't get nearly enough sleep. And the simplest things in life are completely satisfying. I find you don't have to do as much, like you don't go on as many outings.
author: Hugh Jackman

quote: I love to read books that focus on parenting topics because there are so many different ways to do things. I find these books offer a lot of great opinions on many different subjects.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: I am always trying to evolve, so I like to read parenting books and things like that.
author: Kourtney Kardashian

quote: We learn much of parenting from our own parents. My love for my father deepened profoundly when he was kind, patient, and understanding.
author: James E. Faust

quote: The interesting thing about being a mother is that everyone wants pets, but no one but me cleans the kitty litter.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: My parents were divorced when I was a young teenager, and I was raised by a single mother after that. So, I understand the difficulties that families have. I understand single parenting.
author: Michele Bachmann

quote: As a housewife, I feel that if the kids are still alive when my husband gets home from work, then hey, I've done my job.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: I'm torn about late parenting. I believe people should spend their twenties living and having fun and not having any regrets later. I also think people in their thirties generally make better parents but so many of my friends are having trouble - myself included - as fathers get older.
author: Eric McCormack

quote: My work makes me a better mom. It gives me a little door to step out of my parenting and bring the excitement from my day back home.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: My guess is that good and bad parenting is spread fairly evenly across different social groups. But can you imagine Tony Blair lecturing the middle class on how to bring up their children? He is far more comfortable as a latter-day exponent of the Poor Law mentality.
author: Martin Jacques

quote: In my experience (I am the lone father of an eight-year-old boy who lost his mother when he was one year old), parenting is the most difficult of all jobs: forget your chief executives, editors, prime ministers and the like - parenting is far more challenging.
author: Martin Jacques

quote: My grandmother was a kind of Scarsdale, New York, society woman, best known in her day as the author of the 1959 book 'Growing Your Own Way: An Informal Guide for Teen-Agers' - this despite being a person whose parenting style made Joan Crawford's wire hangers look like pool noodles.
author: Sloane Crosley

quote: Ah, the power of two. There's nothing quite like it. Especially when it comes to paying utility bills, parenting, cooking elaborate meals, purchasing a grown-up bed, jumping rope and lifting heavy machinery. The world favours pairs. Who wants to waste the wood building an ark for singletons?
author: Sloane Crosley

quote: A picture excites the love of parenting that comes through meditation on a child.
author: John Dickerson

quote: Parenthood and family come first for me, and when I'm not working I'm cool with the Teletubbies.
author: Clive Owen

quote: Very often when you see families it's all perfect and neat, and parenting isn't like that. You do have constant negotiations. Things are ever developing and ever changing, and you constantly have to evaluate how you deal with your kids.
author: Clive Owen

quote: There's this constant guilt that comes with parenting. You always feel like you're never enough. If you're confident in your parenting, you probably suck at it.
author: Nia Vardalos

quote: 'Kramer vs. Kramer' is one of my favorite films, where you have a story that really juxtaposes a lot of ideas that we have about family and about parenting.
author: Taylor Sheridan

quote: The parenting bit is much harder than the acting bit. You just never know what to do.
author: Helena Bonham Carter

quote: Kids are a great analogy. You want your kids to grow up, and you don't want your kids to grow up. You want your kids to become independent of you, but it's also a parent's worst nightmare: That they won't need you. It's like the real tragedy of parenting.
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: While not impossible, it is especially challenging for teenage parents to develop bonds with their children. A high percent of them were themselves children of teenage parents and have never experienced appropriate parenting.
author: Jane Fonda

quote: I think a dad has to make his daughter feel that he's genuinely interested in what she's going through.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: I think that good parenting should allow children to be children. That naivety and slightly open way of looking at the world is very valuable.
author: Robert Winston

quote: The Internet is just bringing all kinds of information into the home. There's just a lot of distraction, a lot of competition for the parent's voice to resonate in the children's ears.
author: Phil McGraw

quote: Having children with someone is the real bond.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: My parenting heroes are the Obamas! They've been married for so long, and it looks like they're having fun, and their kids are down to earth, well-adjusted, and smart. They seem to have a strong family unit that I would like to emulate in my life.
author: GloZell

quote: Today's new age parenting guarantees you'll hear children screaming, whining, and begging for items and attention in an airplane, store or any other public place.
author: GloZell

quote: The government cannot overcome bad parenting. What our leaders can do is publicly condemn irresponsible parental behavior in vivid terms.
author: Bill O'Reilly

quote: There's no handbook for parenting. So you walk a very fine line as a parent because you are civilizing these raw things. They will tip the coffee over and finger-paint on the table. At some point, you have to say, 'We're gonna have to clean that up because you don't paint with coffee on a table.'
author: Gary Oldman

quote: Parenting is an impossible job at any age.
author: Harrison Ford

quote: In Los Angeles, parenting is a competitive sport. From Beverly Hills baby boutiques to kids' yoga classes, L.A. fuses high style, industrial-strength materialism, and parental outsourcing into our own unique version of child-rearing.
author: Shawn Amos

quote: No fathers or mothers think their own children ugly.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: No, I've never wanted kids. But I do read about parenting a lot.
author: Fiona Apple

quote: Parenting girls makes you quite gender-conscious - it's almost impossible to fight the power of pink. It's not such a terrible thing to want to be a princess when you're five, but it would be nice if there were some other options.
author: Robert Webb

quote: I'm worried about parents who aren't parenting.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Women are individuals in parenting, and why not?
author: Erica Jong

quote: I'm trying to break any chain of negative parenting that I might have survived.
author: Eddie Vedder

quote: I want to have children, but my friends scare me. One of my friends told me she was in labor for 36 hours. I don't even want to do anything that feels good for 36 hours.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: What parent has it easy? I just never make the difficulty of it an obstacle. I just do it.
author: Marlee Matlin

quote: I would love to have kids one day. In fact, I'm pretty good with them. I grew up with five half-siblings, the youngest of whom is 11 years younger than me, so I think I learned some pretty cool parenting skills quite early on in life.
author: Matthew Perry

quote: Asian American success is often presented as something of a horror - robotic, unfeeling machines psychotically hellbent on excelling, products of abusive tiger parenting who care only about test scores and perfection, driven to succeed without even knowing why.
author: Jenny Zhang

quote: No matter how much time you spend reading books or following your intuition, you're gonna screw it up. Fifty times. You can't do parenting right.
author: Alan Arkin

quote: Loving and parenting a dog as a single parent can create all sorts of new and unusual problems, but also new sources of joy.
author: Jenna Morasca

quote: My dad was not super-intentional in his parenting. He was very self-absorbed. I won't say mean or selfish per se, but very self-absorbed. I think he was just thinking out loud.
author: Angela Duckworth

quote: Parenting is tough.
author: Kate Middleton

quote: Around a third of parents still worry that they will look like a bad mother or father if their child has a mental health problem. Parenting is hard enough without letting prejudices stop us from asking for the help we need for ourselves and our children.
author: Kate Middleton

quote: I love, love, love being an actor - it's still the hardest and scariest thing I do, outside of parenting. But I've always been someone who likes a busy day.
author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quote: I'm afraid the parenting advice to come out of developmental psychology is very boring: pay attention to your kids and love them.
author: Alison Gopnik

quote: The science can tell you that the thousands of pseudo-scientific parenting books out there - not to mention the 'Baby Einstein' DVDs and the flash cards and the brain-boosting toys - won't do a thing to make your baby smarter. That's largely because babies are already as smart as they can be smarter than we are in some ways.
author: Alison Gopnik

quote: I would like to do another piece of fiction dealing with a number of issues: Lesbian parenting, the 1960's, and interracial relationships in the Lesbian and Gay community.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: The thing about parenting rules is there aren't any. That's what makes it so difficult.
author: Ewan McGregor

quote: Mama and Daddy King represent the best in manhood and womanhood, the best in a marriage, the kind of people we are trying to become.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: We had a kid. The kid was awesome. She didn't fall asleep easily. We complained about it. We got frustrated. But we didn't look for an out. We just accepted that this was part of parenting.
author: Adam Mansbach

quote: When it comes right down to it, developing a critical sensibility about parenting isn't really about disapproval; it's about honing your own sensibilities, figuring out how you want to parent.
author: Adam Mansbach

quote: It's hilarious to me that by writing an obscene fake children's book I am mistaken for a parenting expert.
author: Adam Mansbach

quote: I do not think there was anything abusive in my house. Yet, I stand by a lot of my critiques of Western parenting. I think there's a lot of questions about how you instill true self-esteem.
author: Amy Chua

quote: To be honest, I know that a lot of Asian parents are secretly shocked and horrified by many aspects of Western parenting.
author: Amy Chua

quote: I think there are many ways to raise great kids. From what I can tell, Ayelet Waldman's kids are interesting, strong, and happy, and if that's the case, that's good parenting.
author: Amy Chua

quote: We go into parenting, and we discover that we don't have the answers. We are at a loss.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Parenting is no sport for perfectionists.
author: Andrew Solomon

quote: The most rewarding aspect of parenting is seeing my children be authentic. The most rewarding thing for me is to see them do anything that they're proud of.
author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quote: The challenging part of parenting for me is to make sure that an individual person is an individual and not some sort of cookie-cutter version of me. At the same time, I want to make sure that I impart my sense of the world as an adult.
author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quote: Attachment parenting demands not just certain actions you take with your baby but also certain emotional states to accompany those actions.
author: Hanna Rosin

quote: I don't think my father considered allowing a teenager to follow his dreams was necessarily good parenting, or even parenting. I think he thought I was a teenager with teenage impulses. I'm pretty sure he knew that if he just let me follow those impulses, it would wind up being very expensive and perhaps even life-endangering.
author: W. Bruce Cameron
